div.p: Number is an optional attribute attached to CHILDREN (within FAMILY, in the BIOGRAPHY section of entries) which allows you to enter the figure (only) for the number of children that a writer had. Use figures not words. N.b. this is from the motherâ€™s point of view, so include stillborn or short-lived babies.
Do not include empty children elements with attribute values. If she had two children, say so in the prose. If sources say seven or eight use your judgement!
